examples.question: A coin is heads up. Niki flips the coin. Graham flips the coin. Vernon flips the coin. Beau flips the coin. Is the coin still heads up? Note that "flip" here means "reverse".

A coin is heads up. Bernie does not flip the coin. Melina does not flip the coin. Kelsey does not flip the coin. Rusty flips the coin. Is the coin still heads up? Note that "flip" here means "reverse".
